about_the_game:
Hibiscus Red | Part 2: Another World


In the second part of the series, Hibiscus explores the other world in search of his father. As the plot thickens, Hibiscus faces old enemies and makes new friends who help him on his way.

Features:
  • Almost classic point and click adventure game
  • Part 2 of 4 with 1+ hours of gameplay
  • Multi-language support: English and german texts
  • Text-to-speech option for english language
  • No hint mechanics, so not so easy I guess, yes it's a feature!
detailed_description:
Hibiscus Red | Part 2: Another World


In the second part of the series, Hibiscus explores the other world in search of his father. As the plot thickens, Hibiscus faces old enemies and makes new friends who help him on his way.

Features:
  • Almost classic point and click adventure game
  • Part 2 of 4 with 1+ hours of gameplay
  • Multi-language support: English and german texts
  • Text-to-speech option for english language
  • No hint mechanics, so not so easy I guess, yes it's a feature!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Hibiscus Red | Part 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
